website_summaries.verdict: Old-school glamor gets an update in this clear PVC, stadium-approved clutch from Hoxis.
pros: Made of transparent PVC and Vinyl
Clasp closure with detachable golden chain
Measures 8.3 inches by 6.5 inches by 3.1 inches
Choice of clear or other transparent colors
Room for cell phone, keys, credit card, lip balm, etc
cons: Bag can be challenging to open, especially if you use it outside in cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, and Love
customer_reviews.text: I Love my Little bag. I get so many compliments. I actually brought this bag to go to Miami for a few days and had no intentions on wearing it after that. But I decided to continue to wear it, and I just fell in Love even more. And so many people stop me and ask me where did I get it from !? You will love it !
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Precious

customer_reviews.title: I really like it it was bigger that what I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it it was bigger that what I thought it fits a lot of stuff the only think I notice it a little hard, but even my iPhone 7 Plus fit perfectly and more ... here are some of my pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bag! I was able to fit a small umbrella in it (I believe the umbrella was 7 inches long.) However, I wouldn't put too many items in it, my clasp broke off that evening, which could have been a result of me over-stuffing the purse. I reached out to the company about it asking if there was any way they could fix it for me since I just purchased it. Their customer service was top notch! Responded right away and took care of the issue for me. It seems like more and more venues are beginning to require clear bags at events, so I highly suggest grabbing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Yaranda

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CLEAR PURSE
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag because I love clear purses and the kiss lock purses, this reminds me of the clear kiss lock purses from the 50's, it's very sturdy and it's bigger than I thought, I have a small phone and I'm glad it could fit in here, I'll wrap my stuff in the purse with a sheer scarf with the color that matches my outfit like they did in the past, I'm very please with this lovely purse.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! The hologram tone makes the bag see-through, but it also changes color depending on the angle from which you're viewing it. So it camouflages the contents to a degree, whereas a clear bag would not. There was plenty of room for my cell phone, keys credit card and a few additional items. Plus, I bought a t-shirt at the concert for which I purchased the bag, and there was room for me to store the shirt (rolling it up, of course.) I also got several compliments from people and one of the security girls fell in love with the bag, asking where she could get one, too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J Maher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Really really cute. I plan to use this as my everyday purse. There wasn’t a strong chemical smell that I expected it to have at first, which is great! Like with any chain strap purse, you have to wear it across your body because it will roll off your shoulder if it is held on just one side of your body. It is also super cute as a clutch! And it can actually hold quite a lot!
customer_reviews.author: SuSu

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: This bag is good-sized and pretty good quality. The plastic material makes it stiff which can make it a pain to open, but this also means it won’t as easily warp with usage. There is also tiny fraying in the stitching which can easily be trimmed. I work in the cosmetics industry and we do bag checks, so this makes things easier for us all.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I Live In-Color, do You? This is a GR8 Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love!...the Look and design. I was hoping it was Adult-size, you know? Great, It is THE Perfect Size! Why only 4-stars? Nothing so awful, yet! Too new. It's very stiff, unlike my prev "pvc" purses. And the Kiss-lock is really tight, harder for me to open it. I think the plastic part of my new purse is going to detach from the beautiful gold opening-arm-mechanisms or from the gold rims. I hope I am mistaken. If I am, I will UPDATE, my Review & include a 5th-☆, *only IF this "TOO-Cute" purse holds up for just One(1)-month! I'll be Really Happy to Update! T.B.D. in 30-Days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary929W

customer_reviews.title: Trendy & Overall EXCELLENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest holographic/iridescent purse/clutch EVER!!!!!!!! The overall quality of this item is phenomenal!!!! I'm very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: Great for stadiums
customer_reviews.text: High quality material but also cute! I take this to stadium events with a clear bag policy and just leave it on as a cross body the entire time. The lock is easy to operate but also stays closed. I had to return the first one I was sent because one of the inner folds of plastic was strangely squished, but the replacement is great.
customer_reviews.author: ihrtamzn

customer_reviews.title: Great size bag for strict bag events!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and it's perfect for the BTS concert I'm attending in May. The company packaged the product nicely so there was no scratches during transportation. This bag is almost as tall as a PS4 controller if your wondering the height of the bag itself. It's got great room, and the clasps are easy to close and open. I'm very pleased with this product! I'm able to fit my wallet, keys, lotion, travel straw, chapstick, and still have some room left in the purse.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Watson

customer_reviews.title: 💕BUY IT💕
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this clear purse is everything I LOVE IT!!! can’t wait to carry it!!!! It looks just like the images only bigger to me than the images I saw on the reviews I added a few up close photos for you but order it YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Mizcali

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag and I'm so happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and I'm so happy I bought it. It's GREAT quality, not cheap at all. Came nicely packaged, had packaging inside the bag so it wasn't squished and didn't lose it's shape.. Came with a cute little tie bag that housed the gold chain. I highly recommend! I think I'm going to order another style bag by Hoxis.. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unique bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so pretty and well-made! I bought it for a concert in a stadium that require clear bags only. This will do just fine! I had a question about the bag once I got it, and their customer service was outstanding and instantly solved my problem, as well as gave me some good tips about taking care of the bag's upkeep. 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I get sooooooooo many complements
customer_reviews.text: I literally get stopped so ppl can tell me how cute it is. It also works in stadiums with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: great for concerts and sport events
customer_reviews.text: So cute, and so many places do not allow regular purses, but almost all concerts and sport events DO allow this kind of purse, gave it as a gift for daughter, who liked it very much and now she HAS a purse to take to concerts now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer33333

customer_reviews.title: LOVVVVE
customer_reviews.text: Omg I live this little bag so much. It’s a nice size not too small not too big, the chain is great quality. I have to have a clear bag at my job and I am constantly getting compliments. I can’t wait to need a clear bag to go to an event because this will definitely be coming with me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAG! It’s EXACTLY like it’s described. I purchased it to wear strictly for NFL games and concerts, but it’s much nicer quality than what I was expecting, so I’ll be more inclined to wear it on date nights as well. The detachable chain strap is super durable and has some weight to it, which is nice. Most of the inexpensive bags I’ve bought on amazon have chincy hardware. I’ve shared the link with several friends and they love theirs just as much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag when you need a clear bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use when we went to see The Rolling Stones. They were applying the stadium clear bag policy. This purse worked great and was cute. I received several compliments from other concert goers.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I purchased this bag. It held more things than I thought & it went perfectly with my shoes. The little bag that the chain came in was so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kavia

customer_reviews.title: This bag was HORRIBLE! The clasp was very hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This bag was HORRIBLE! The clasp was very hard to open, and it was even harder to make the opening wide enough to get almost anything in or out of it. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but it is difficult to open as it is very stiff. Kiss kick is fine, it’s just the outer structure that is stiff and makes it difficult to open easily. Also the chain has come lose a few times and is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcy

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for stadium games now that they have the clear ...
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for stadium games now that they have the clear bag rule most places. I wore it to a football game on New Years day when it was freezing cold. The clear bag got very hard to open after being outside in the cold weather. I would have preferred an easier way to open it like a zipper or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Transparency
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse. I got so many compliments on it. The purse is really durable. I will love to have this in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Ms T

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish bag perfect for pro stadium games
customer_reviews.text: Great and stylish bag- perfect for stadium games. Chain is long enough to wear as a cross body bag and it holds a ton of stuff. Minor issue with clasp staying closed, but as long as you don’t overload it, it’s not an issue. I get compliments all the time- so happy I bought it now that my team is in the playoffs!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Z. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, perfect for clear bag stadiums
customer_reviews.text: This bag is freaking adorable. I bought it to bring to soccer games where they have a clear bag policy. I’m obsessed, I might use it all the time. It is a little stiff, but I expected that... it still opens widely enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee J. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: it was pretty difficult to get it out of my purse to ...
customer_reviews.text: Because the plastic is rigid, it does not open very far and I could barely fit my glasses plus iPhone. When my phone started ringing, it was pretty difficult to get it out of my purse to answer it. On the plus side, it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this purse. Great size and I can take it into any establishment. Bought it specifically for soccer stadium but i found myself using it at wedding and other gatherings. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag for a big stadium show! The only complaint is the kiss lock closure not close all the way if you have too much stuff in the bag, but overall still cute and can use for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is very thick and durable. Fits my iPhone X, 16 oz bottle of water and a few other small items. It’s a tight fit but held up nicely. Chain is long and works great for a crossover. Clasp is heavy duty and it’s tight and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Not Practical
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very cute but it's very difficult to open. The opening is not more than 2 inches which makes putting and talking things out difficult. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse for football games and concerts! I even change the strap from time to time (it’s a chain w/ claw clasps). You can insert almost purse strap into it 2 change the look or show team spirit!
customer_reviews.author: jessica p.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stylish, many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This purse is adorable. Bought it for the NF concert, but wear it all the time because I am a momma and it is easy to keep track of everything because I can see through it. I get compliments all the time. VERY good quality, I was super shocked!!! My only negative thing is the gold on the chain is turning a little, but I do wear it everyday when I’m out. I still love it though!
customer_reviews.author: TTG

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: This purse looks great and has a good capacity, but the clear plastic material is very stiff and that makes it very, very difficult to open and access the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Grammy

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Don’t know why some people said their ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Don’t know why some people said their phone didn’t fit cause it’s way bigger than I thought. My iPhone 7 Plus fits.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: An okay bag...
customer_reviews.text: I wore this bag to football game. I do like the bag but the chain strap is a little to short for me and periodically one side of the chain clamp kept slipping off which was a little annoying. I ended up taking the chain strap off and wearing it as a clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina W.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for game day
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for game day! Stadiums require clear bags now so this is the perfect bag to meet the policy and still be stylish! For the price, quality is good -- you don't need anything more. Pleasantly surprised with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stadium Bag
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bag for concerts, games, events were clear bag at required. Good size for phone, money, keys. Very pretty bag. Love the clasp. Elegant.
customer_reviews.author: A Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed can’t wait to use it!! So cute perfect length crossbody good structure and spacious and the clasp on top is strong!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Functional and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: used the purse for a concert and it's worked out great. Roomy but not bulky. Was able to fit keys, 2 wallets, an ipgone x and some make up.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun affordable
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag. Good chain length. Just transparent enough and it has a little bag you can use for anything you want hidden.
customer_reviews.author: kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium purse
customer_reviews.text: Chain is refined and classy, much prettier than some clunkier versions I saw at my local mall. Will be perfect for theater performances, which require see-through bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great for an NFL game!
customer_reviews.text: Took to an NFL game and got tons of compliments held all the necessities I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz R

customer_reviews.title: Love clear bags
customer_reviews.text: I love see threw carry bags, this one is nice BUT IT IS VERY SMALL, SO IF YOU ONLY HAVE A FEW THINGS TO CARRY IN IT IT WILL BE FINE
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Closure Snap broke
customer_reviews.text: Used the purse only 2 times and one of the closure snaps broke off. The plasic is very stiff so it is hard to open the top all the way to get items in and out of the purse. Looks really nice but I would choose one with a zipper due to these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for clear bag policy
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great quality and perfect for stadiums that require the clear bag policy. The only downside is the chain is a little long for my petite frame, however, I would still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Arrived exactly as depicted. Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: This arrived a day later than the concert I needed it for, but I’m overlooking that. There will be other shows and this will come in handy. Beautifully packaged. Chain had a few little tangles, but I easily worked them out. Adorable and really just the ticket for concerts and such.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cute and unique!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and different. Chain strap is thick and seems like good quality. Definitely a statement bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Dar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bag! Great quality. A LOT of compliments! This is my 2nd purchase as a gift for my friend cuz she absolutely went crazy over mine!
customer_reviews.author: kcruz

customer_reviews.title: Stylish stadium acceptable purse
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a stadium acceptable, clear purse. Easily holds cellphone, small wallet, and a few extra necessities. Always receive a ton a compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: So the bag is clear which is great....however to open it up is difficult and the chain where the clasp connects isn't very sturdy at all. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stadiums with clear bag policies.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a super cute purse - perfect for game day stadiums with the clear bag policy. I didn’t give it 5 stars because it’s a little hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous in person!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture! Thick shiny PVC with luscious iridescence over all. The bright gold tone clasp actually offsets the cool tones of the vinyl well.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderbaby Fastwolf

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag and good quality! I bought this to use for football games and have not had any issues thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Worked well for my last concert. Cute design too with the chain.
customer_reviews.author: Malia Nolin

customer_reviews.title: The purse was GREAT! Came in on time and fit more than ...
customer_reviews.text: The purse was GREAT! Came in on time and fit more than enough to take in to games. It was actually just a little larger than I thought. Super adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Concert Goers
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was perfect for the OTR II concert and received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the occassion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little bag for a concert. Went to see Ariana Grande and she will not let anyone in without clear bags. This was perfect. Held the right amount of stuff. Opens and closes nicely. Very good quality for the amount of money I paid for this item.
customer_reviews.author: joe reischel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so cute!!! Fits the essentials and with the clear bag policy the stadiums now have, this is perfect! The chain came inside a little pouch, so the bag is not dented or scratched. I can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clear purse!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag for a stadium event, and this was perfect! It fit a surprising amount of stuff, and I love the vintage-look styling. The chain was long enough for me to wear it as a cross-body bag. I got a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: grammarmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, but smaller than I could wish for. I got compliments, tho. Does the job, holds more than you might think.
customer_reviews.author: Kismetmiao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NFL games
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for NFL games. Get sooo many compliments on it. Large enough to fit essentials. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MegMar

customer_reviews.title: Love this concert/sporting event purse
customer_reviews.text: Love this concert/sporting event purse! Bigger than I expected (which was great) and the gold chain worn criss cross over your chest adds a super pretty touch. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Rooseville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Great for sports venue that only allows clear bags, travel, night out.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute purse, just as pictured, but not sure how long the gold will stay gold
customer_reviews.author: Fern & Janet

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, not a cheap thin clear plastic
customer_reviews.text: Luvv it!! Bought it to take to the Eagles game (Go Birds!!) and for work....I've gotten more compliments on it then my designer purse😂🙃 Definitely the Most stylist clear purse!! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts
customer_reviews.text: Size is great. It'll fit everything you need (phone, wallet, makeup, etc). It holds up well and looks really cute. It's also a perfect choice for stadium events or concerts.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using this as an everyday makeup bag I keep at home, because of the hardness.
customer_reviews.author: Penman

customer_reviews.title: My birthday  purse
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT. Just the size I want. The only thing the chain could be a little longer. But I got one that would fit
customer_reviews.author: tanika howard

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was an xmas gift to my sister and she loved it. Really cute unique handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I want another one and sell it at Macy’s for three times the price
customer_reviews.text: I want another one, Remember this Type of plastic does this Stiff in the cold, And I could still use it though
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than picture
customer_reviews.text: These purse looks and feel way better than the pics online. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: LaPrecious Chavis

customer_reviews.title: Stadium approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for football games. Stadium approved. However it doesn’t fit much but the size is listed in description!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gazdziak

customer_reviews.title: Fun but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Got this for white nights glow party. Thought the hologram bag would be fun. Came blemished with a dent in it. I always say (it doesn’t happen to me). Well it did ... I’ll probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie B.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest clutch
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful clutch ever I love it! My iPhone xs Max fits perfectly just an fyi :)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Clearly great
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag as my special occasion bag. Used it at a wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Williams

customer_reviews.title: This clear bag is adorable. I had my daughters initials added with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This clear bag is adorable. I had my daughters initials added with a glittery gold vinyl decal and it's beautiful. Will definitely buy again for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: KGarrison1022

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved, including me!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute on my cruise trip...the hard acrylic is tough to close if there’s too much loaded inside so I’d keep it to the bare essentials & for short term trips-thank you💋
customer_reviews.author: ImpressedTresses

customer_reviews.title: Good for stadiums
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for stadiums where you must use a clear bag but I wish it was a little more flexible. The clasp is a little hard to open. The bags wants to stay shut so you kind of have to pry it open to get anything out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: In loveeeee
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best bag ever! Fits a decent amount of items and matches with everything. Went to a party and every woman loved it !!!
customer_reviews.author: MArdila

customer_reviews.title: La Colesium approved
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for the Rams game. It fit my phone, keys and small makeup bag and I had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality material compared to a very similar bag I bought. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is the perfect size and it matches my shoes. I will be using it as often as I can, won’t have to do a purse check with this one😎
customer_reviews.author: Bernita P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for new bag guidelines in stadiums!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for football games. I get so many compliments! Good quality and holds everything I need for a long game day. The bag checkers love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Josey Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great clutch
customer_reviews.text: This product is very pretty. I am happy with what i received. It changes colors as the light hits it but it is still see through. The only complaint is it doesn't open that wide so if you're reaching down in the clutch it might scratch your hand from the metal part that clcloses the purse.
customer_reviews.author: Korey Donley

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it; it holds a lot more than I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it; it holds a lot more than I thought it would. No problem at the concert venue.
customer_reviews.author: coachdubya

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small
customer_reviews.text: Cute purse but the opening at the top makes it very difficult to retrieve items.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah W.

customer_reviews.title: Clear bag
customer_reviews.text: Really cute bag.I can fit sunglasses, keys,a small wallet, coin purse and a iPhone 6 .
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the perfect size. It's a cute purse. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great clear bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag without logos that would go with any outfit when attending stadium concerts! Love this bag and get so many compliments every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: caiti

customer_reviews.title: Thick plastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sooo I’m love with my new purse!! excellent quality. So much better than I expected. If taken care of, surely will last long! (: 10/10
customer_reviews.author: ZimsPtln 🌞

customer_reviews.title: Trendy, durable and functional!  Great for taking to work or for everyday use!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I wanted!! No regrets whatsoever! It’s see through, holds everything I need and use on a daily basis for work and durable but cute! Getting plenty of compliments! This is a great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Find another stadium purse.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to open. Very stiff. Struggled to get things in and out of quickly. Started to fall apart after only a few uses. Was purchased to take to football games. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mehlbauer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Pretty beautiful, got lots of compliments! Also pretty functional and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cute and just the right size for a phone and a small wallet
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: super cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: had to buy this for game days since the sec's new clear bag policy. super cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aderer

customer_reviews.title: IM IN LOVE WITH THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: IM IN LOVE WITH THIS BAG. ITS GREAT FOR CONCERTS, STADIUM GAMES OR ANYTHING FOR THAT MATTER. I’m a minimalistic kind of person and this is absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Snook

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the product. Straight out of the package the ring for the strap was broken. Bought it for a wine tasting evening, and didn't want to be struggling holding a purse. Will never purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Does not open wide enough.
customer_reviews.text: Like the gold trim. The opening is small and does not open “wide.” Hard to reach down to the bottom due to this. Fits my iPhone 7plus with certain maneuvering.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Marina Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag but very stiff. Need both hands to open.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni
